verses.kjv: And he shewed me a pure river of water of life, clear as crystal, proceeding out of the throne of God and of the Lamb.
verses.ct: Then the angel showed me a river of the water of life, pure as crystal, flowing from the throne of God and of the Lamb.

verses.kjv: In the midst of the street of it, and on either side of the river, was there the tree of life, which bare twelve manner of fruits, and yielded her fruit every month: and the leaves of the tree were for the healing of the nations.
verses.ct: Down the middle of the city's main street, and on each side of the river, stood the tree of life. It produced 12 kinds of fruit, bearing its fruit each month, and the leaves of the tree brought healing to the nations.

verses.kjv: And there shall be no more curse: but the throne of God and of the Lamb shall be in it; and his servants shall serve him:
verses.ct: There will no longer be any curse. The throne of God and of the Lamb will be in the city, and his servants will serve him.

verses.kjv: And they shall see his face; and his name shall be in their foreheads.
verses.ct: They will see him face to face, and his name will be written on their foreheads.

verses.kjv: And there shall be no night there; and they need no candle, neither light of the sun; for the Lord God giveth them light: and they shall reign for ever and ever.
verses.ct: Night will no longer exist there. They won't need lamplight or sunlight, because the Lord God will shine on them, and they will rule forever and ever.

verses.kjv: And he said unto me, These sayings are faithful and true: and the Lord God of the holy prophets sent his angel to shew unto his servants the things which must shortly be done.
verses.ct: Then the angel told me, "These words are trustworthy and true. The Lord God, who inspires the holy prophets, sent his angel to show his servants what must happen soon."

verses.kjv: Behold, I come quickly: blessed is he that keepeth the sayings of the prophecy of this book.
verses.ct: "Pay attention — I am coming soon! Anyone who obeys the words of the prophecy in this book will be blessed."

verses.kjv: And I John saw these things, and heard them. And when I had heard and seen, I fell down to worship before the feet of the angel which shewed me these things.
verses.ct: I, John, am the one who saw and heard all of this. After I had heard and seen everything, I dropped to the ground to worship at the feet of the angel who had shown me these things.

verses.kjv: Then saith he unto me, See thou do it not: for I am thy fellowservant, and of thy brethren the prophets, and of them which keep the sayings of this book: worship God.
verses.ct: But he told me, "Don't do that! I am a fellow servant alongside you, your brothers the prophets, and everyone who obeys the words of this book. Worship God!"

verses.kjv: And he saith unto me, Seal not the sayings of the prophecy of this book: for the time is at hand.
verses.ct: He also told me, "Don't seal up the words of the prophecy in this book, because the time is near."

verses.kjv: He that is unjust, let him be unjust still: and he which is filthy, let him be filthy still: and he that is righteous, let him be righteous still: and he that is holy, let him be holy still.
verses.ct: "Let the one who does wrong keep doing wrong. Let the one who is corrupt keep being corrupt. Let the one who is righteous keep living righteously. And let the one who is holy keep living in holiness."

verses.kjv: And, behold, I come quickly; and my reward is with me, to give every man according as his work shall be.
verses.ct: "Pay attention — I am coming soon! I am bringing my reward with me, and I will repay each person based on what they have done."

verses.kjv: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the end, the first and the last.
verses.ct: "I am the Alpha and the Omega, the beginning and the end, the first and the last."

verses.kjv: Blessed are they that do his commandments, that they may have right to the tree of life, and may enter in through the gates into the city.
verses.ct: Those who follow his commandments are blessed, so that they will have the right to the tree of life and may go through the gates into the city.

verses.kjv: For without are dogs, and sorcerers, and whoremongers, and murderers, and idolaters, and whosoever loveth and maketh a lie.
verses.ct: Outside the city are the vile, the sorcerers, the sexually immoral, the murderers, the idol worshipers, and everyone who loves and practices deception.

verses.kjv: I Jesus have sent mine angel to testify unto you these things in the churches. I am the root and the offspring of David, and the bright and morning star.
verses.ct: "I, Jesus, have sent my angel to give you this testimony for the churches. I am the root and the descendant of David, the bright morning star."

verses.kjv: And the Spirit and the bride say, Come. And let him that heareth say, Come. And let him that is athirst come. And whosoever will, let him take the water of life freely.
verses.ct: The Spirit and the bride say, "Come!" Let everyone who hears this say, "Come!" Let anyone who is thirsty come. Whoever wants it, let them take the water of life as a free gift.

verses.kjv: For I testify unto every man that heareth the words of the prophecy of this book, If any man shall add unto these things, God shall add unto him the plagues that are written in this book:
verses.ct: I give this warning to everyone who hears the words of the prophecy in this book: if anyone adds anything to them, God will add to that person the plagues described in this book.

verses.kjv: And if any man shall take away from the words of the book of this prophecy, God shall take away his part out of the book of life, and out of the holy city, and from the things which are written in this book.
verses.ct: And if anyone removes words from this book of prophecy, God will remove that person's share in the tree of life and in the holy city, which are described in this book.

verses.kjv: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.
verses.ct: The one who testifies to all of this says, "Yes, I am coming soon." Amen! Come, Lord Jesus!

verses.kjv: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen.
verses.ct: May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with all of you. Amen.
